title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Authenticity-Based E-Learning Expertise for Higher Education Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational operation experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three authentic e-learning design principles to actual course design.
Learners can utilize at least two interactive facilitation techniques in a real-time online environment.
Learners can evaluate instructors' lecture materials and propose improvements through digital feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
